## AnonymousPathsStart interface

APIs for denoting paths as not requiring authentication

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface AnonymousPathsStart 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [isAnonymous(path)](./kibana-plugin-core-public.anonymouspathsstart.isanonymous.md) | Determines whether the provided path doesn't require authentication. <code>path</code> should include the current basePath. |
